string-array.name: environment_item_descriptions
string-array.item: The current state of the external storage device.

A top-level public external storage directory for placing files of a particular type: which is a value returned by invoking {android.os.Environment.getExternalStoragePublicDirectory(java.lang.String)} with the parameter {android.os.Environment.DIRECTORY_ALARMS}.

A top-level public external storage directory for placing files of a particular type: which is a value returned by invoking {android.os.Environment.getExternalStoragePublicDirectory(java.lang.String)} with the parameter {android.os.Environment.DIRECTORY_DICM}.

A top-level public external storage directory for placing files of a particular type: which is a value returned by invoking {android.os.Environment.getExternalStoragePublicDirectory(java.lang.String)} with the parameter {android.os.Environment.DIRECTORY_DOWNLOADS}.

A top-level public external storage directory for placing files of a particular type: which is a value returned by invoking {android.os.Environment.getExternalStoragePublicDirectory(java.lang.String)} with the parameter {android.os.Environment.DIRECTORY_MOVIES}.

A top-level public external storage directory for placing files of a particular type: which is a value returned by invoking {android.os.Environment.getExternalStoragePublicDirectory(java.lang.String)} with the parameter {android.os.Environment.DIRECTORY_MUSIC}.

A top-level public external storage directory for placing files of a particular type: which is a value returned by invoking {android.os.Environment.getExternalStoragePublicDirectory(java.lang.String)} with the parameter {android.os.Environment.DIRECTORY_NOTIFICATIONS}.

A top-level public external storage directory for placing files of a particular type: which is a value returned by invoking {android.os.Environment.getExternalStoragePublicDirectory(java.lang.String)} with the parameter {android.os.Environment.DIRECTORY_PICTURES}.

A top-level public external storage directory for placing files of a particular type: which is a value returned by invoking {android.os.Environment.getExternalStoragePublicDirectory(java.lang.String)} with the parameter {android.os.Environment.DIRECTORY_PODCASTS}.

A top-level public external storage directory for placing files of a particular type: which is a value returned by invoking {android.os.Environment.getExternalStoragePublicDirectory(java.lang.String)} with the parameter {android.os.Environment.DIRECTORY_RINGTONES}.
